channel.title: How do you make players Mods/Admins?
channel.description:
Please answer the question to the subject :D thanks!!
i'm thinking it would be a code? what would the code be

item.title: How do you make players Mods/Admins?
item.dc:creator: @liljon liljon
item.description:
@liljon wrote:

It’s really simple.
For any Testscape based source:
1:Open up client.java and press CTRL+F and type in ‘admin list’
2:Follow the image.
http://www.imagehosting.com/show.php/429617_testscaperights.JPG.html

For any other source, Pimpscape, Project 16, etc use this:
1:Open the ‘characters’ folder.
2:Search for the person you want to make mod/admin.
3:Follow the image below
http://www.imagehosting.com/show.php/429612_characterrights.JPG.html

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make players Mods/Admins?

item.title: How do you make players Mods/Admins?
item.dc:creator: @Tyler_W Tyler W.
item.description:
@Tyler_W wrote:

all you have to do is go into your source file exp:testscape click on charectars and on like the 5th line it says like charectar rank or something like that it will say 0 change to 1 for p mod and 2 g mod and 3 for co owner

Read full topic
